title: Seasonal Work
detail_text: <:th_ch0208/>Heave ho, heave ho......<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0006/>Would you like me to help you carry all of that?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0208/>Ah, Maki-chan. Please, I’d appreciate it. I bought way too much because they were so cheap.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0006/>What are you gonna do with that many apples?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0208/>Ehehe, I’m gonna make jam~ 𝅘𝅥𝅮<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0006/>Jam?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0208/>Yeah! You can spread it on bread or add it to yogurt. It’ll be delicious~<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0006/>Hmm......<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0208/>Once I’m done, Maki-chan, I’ll give you half!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0006/>What!? No, it’s okay. You paid for all this, Emma.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0208/>Well, I won’t be able to finish it all alone. Plus, Maki-chan, I’d love for you to taste my apple jam.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0006/>Okay then, thank you...... I’ll help you make the jam.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
